wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.NAME: Burn
wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, NL draw a card. NL You take !M! more damage. NL Exhaust.

wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.NAME: Finale of Promise
wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards in your discard pile that cost X or less and play copies of them. If X is 6 or more, play them both twice. NL Exhaust.
wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards in your discard pile that cost X + 1 or less and play copies of them. If X + 1 is 6 or more, play them both twice. NL Exhaust.
